body:
Is this a bug report or feature request?
* Bug Report

**Bug Report**

What happened: Installing Rook operator with Helm chart in a Kubernetes environment with an invalid k8s semver fails with the following error:
```
Error: render error in "rook/templates/wait-on-resources-job.yaml": template: rook/templates/wait-on-resources-job.yaml:25:100: executing "rook/templates/wait-on-resources-job.yaml" at <semverCompare ">=1.7...>: error calling semverCompare: Invalid Semantic Version
```

What you expected to happen: Installing Rook operator with helm to succeed

How to reproduce it (minimal and precise): Install Rook operator using the Helm v0.7.1 Helm chart using the instructions at https://rook.io/docs/rook/master/helm-operator.html.  The environment must have an invalid semver as shown in the environment section below.

**Environment**:
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod): v0.7.1
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9", GitVersion:"v1.9.2", GitCommit:"5fa2db2bd46ac79e5e00a4e6ed24191080aa463b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-01-18T10:09:24Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.3-rancher1", GitCommit:"d5aea0c6d208786ae608d4154669de6e9319bdc7", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-02-13T17:28:50Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

milestone.description:
* Multiple storage backends
  * Full design
  * Refactor code base and repositories to enable
  * Consider support for Minio, potentially early support for other backends time permitting
* Switch CRDs to API Aggregation
* Run on arbitrary PVs
* Remove Rook API and CLI
* Migrate CI and release pipelines to a solution hosted by the CNCF
* Run with Least Privileged and possibly without privileged containers
* Shutdown / restart issues
* Support Kubernetes 1.7+ only
* Ceph features and improvements
  * Adding/removing disks (lifecycle issues, failures, 1 OSD per pod, etc.)
  * Placement group balancer support (ceph-mgr module)
  * Mon reliability (restarts, failing over too fast, ip changes, etc.)
  * Mimic support

title: helm wait-on-resources-job.yaml template doesn't handle invalid semvers
